property.name: Blitz Through Factories And AA Restricted
Units Can Be Destroyed Instead Of Captured
Unplaced units live when not placed
notes
property.value: The year is 2020, the battle for new yawk. It is ugly. Leaders and femdoms (female fighting units!!) are artillery (generals), they support infantry, halftrac and cavalry. The police have been massively reinforced by the National Guard to surpress the gangs. There are land bridges and no ships. Mod by Roger Cooper from the original new yawk. The misspellings are in the original.
